episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01: Oh, there you are!

Here you go! A gift for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I made some sweets again!
(Say thanks.)
Not at all! You’re welcome!
(Say it looks tasty.)
Hehe! I did pretty good with them, didn’t I?

I’ve been making a lot of sweets since Siebold
taught me how.

Oh! I’ve also been working hard on my
live performances!
I’ve been researching about contests, too!

There are so many things I want to do, and each
time I try out new things...
I can find a new side of myself. It’s so rewarding!
Or, that’s how I want it to be...
I tend to overthink things.

There are so many people here who chase
their dreams...

Ever since I came to Pasio, I’ve discovered myself
many times. It’s like meeting a new me!

But now I’m not sure which of them is the
true me.

I hope I can find something that I can proudly say
is me...

(Tell her you’ll help her find
a dream.)
My...dream?
(Offer to help her out.)
Thank you for taking me seriously.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Dawn talked
about their dreams and goals.

For a change of pace, they decided to climb
a mountain.
OK then! Let’s climb this mountain together!
This is gonna help me find yet another me!
Before sunrise...

Dawn and [Name:PlayerNickname ] made their
way up the steep mountain and arrived at
the summit.
We finally arrived!

When I was in Sinnoh, I managed to climb Mt.
Coronet with help from Pokémon, but it really
is hard!

Until today, a lot of people and Pokémon have
helped me out.

Thanks to that, I was able to see how big the
world is.
I learned that the world is full of fun things.

It’s hard to choose just one out of all those
things, huh?

I hope I can get together with all the people and
Pokémon who’ve helped me up until now...
and tell them, “This is what I’m all about!”
(Tell her there’s no need to rush.)
That’s true...
(Tell her she’ll figure it out someday.)
Someday...
Thanks. I guess that’s true, huh?
Oh! The sun is rising!
Look how beautiful it is...
I’m so glad to see this view!
Like you said, there’s no need to rush!

If I try hard and work through what’s in front
of me, then someday...
I may be able to find my one and only light!

In order to do that, I’ll try my best in everything I
do and shine bright like the sun!

When you find your dream, I hope you tell me
about it, too!
I’ll cheer for you with all my heart!

We’re a dream team, and there’s no dream we
can’t make happen!
Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
